description: Agent archetype registry for HR Director team composition. 30 archetypes across 5 categories provide diverse options for building optimal teams.

orchestrator.description: Strategic coordinators who manage team discussions and make final decisions

content_creation.description: Specialists who research, create, and optimize content

intelligence.description: Analysts who provide data-driven insights for strategy

quality_safety.description: Validators who ensure brand safety and content quality

engagement.description: Community builders who handle interactions and relationships

trend_focused_team.description: Fast-paced team that jumps on trending topics

meme_focused_team.description: Humorous team specializing in viral meme content

thread_focused_team.description: Educational team creating long-form thread content

data_driven_team.description: Analytics-focused team optimizing based on performance

viral_testing_team.description: Experimental team focused on A/B testing and viral mechanics

newsjacking_team.description: Rapid-response team for breaking news and viral moments

creative_brand_team.description: Bold creative team pushing boundaries for standout content

conversion_optimization_team.description: Conversion-focused team driving actions and sales

reputation_management_team.description: Protective team monitoring and managing brand reputation

usageInstructions.forHRDirector: Load archetype arrays from category files. With 30 archetypes, you have diverse options to match any account strategy, stage, or goal. Select archetypes by name and fill template variables from owner profile.
archetypeSelection: 1. Choose 1 orchestrator archetype based on team strategy (6 options)
2. Choose 2-4 sub-agent archetypes based on needs (24 options across 4 categories)
3. Ensure at least 1 quality_safety archetype per team
4. Consider owner goals, account stage, and risk tolerance
5. Use commonTeamPatterns (12 templates) as starting points
6. Mix and match archetypes to create unique team compositions
usageInstructions.loading: Load archetypes from JSON files: orchestrators.json (6), content_creation.json (8), intelligence.json (6), quality_safety.json (5), engagement.json (5)

archetypeFields: io.inputs: Array of input parameter names
io.outputs: Array of output parameter names
tool_bindings: Array of tool names needed
